label: Parking lot
info: On your way home, when entering the parking lot at your house, you see this sentence written on the tarmac with colored chalk.

label: Front door
info: At the front door you see a new doormat with the message.

label: Hall
info: In the hall you see a giant banner saying.

label: Kitchen
info: Going to the kitchen, for a snack, you see this message in the kitchen sink.

label: Living room
info: Full and content you lay down on the sofa and switch on the television only to hear this message on full  volume.

label: Patio
info: You go for some fresh air and see this message on the patio table.

label: Garden
info: You run into the garden to hide, but see this message on the bench.

label: Stairway
info: Going up the stairs, to the first floor, you see a message on the steps.

label: Master bedroom
info: In the master bedroom, you this message on the bed.

label: Nursery
info: While checking the baby in the nursery you see these 3 cards on the changing table.

label: Kids bedroom
info: Greeting the teens in kids bedroom, you see this message painted on the wall.

label: Bathroom
info: You go to the bathroom ready for a shower, but you see this on the floor.

label: Attic
info: Your hear a noise from the attic, and go upstairs. only to see this message on the floor.

label: Roof
info: Someone is on the roof, you hear the noise and open a window and see this message.

label: Chimney
info: Climbing up the chimney, you see this smoke signal message.

label: Sky
info: You look up into the sky and see clouds forming this message

label: Moon
info: Turning to the moon, you see the planets coming together forming this message.

label: Last card
info: The last card is here. Tada!
